pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw:
I really wanted to use `std::clamp()` as well because it is so much cleaner, but I ran into issues. With it: 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1086412532-Clamp_Diff.png)
_Figure 1: Diff showing change to std::clamp_

---

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1419018517-Clamp_Build_Issue.png)
_Figure 2: Build issue with std::clamp. Likely related to it being C\+\+ 17 only? If you know how to resolve this, please let me know._

---

 

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/2235339551-C_17_Clamp.png)
_Figure 3: std::clamp documentation. I thought this should work, only issue I see is that it’s only since C\+\+ 17_

Do you know how to resolve this? This is originally why I chose the boost clamp.
content.html:
I really wanted to use std::clamp() as well because it is so much cleaner, but I ran into issues. With it:

Figure 1: Diff showing change to std::clamp

Figure 2: Build issue with std::clamp. Likely related to it being C++ 17 only? If you know how to resolve this, please let me know.

Figure 3: std::clamp documentation. I thought this should work, only issue I see is that it’s only since C++ 17

Do you know how to resolve this? This is originally why I chose the boost clamp.
